description: Today is a very special day for Cody Cummings, as his best friend is getting married in few short hours. Cody is all dressed up and ready to attend the celebration, as the car is en route to pick him up. With about a half hour to kill, he starts thinking of weddings and his thoughts quickly turn to the wedding night. As he brushes his hand up against his crotch, he realizes that his daydreams have gotten him a little worked up. Leaning back on the couch, he spreads his legs and throws his head back in fantasy, running his free hand up and down his quivering torso until the head of his cock is throbbing to burst, which Cody does with only a few minutes to spare. Today is going to be a good day, indeed. Enjoy!
title: The Best Man
